item.title: A School for Agency
item.description: A School for Agency Agency is where you act to achieve your goals. It’s where you look at problems and say “How could I solve them?” and really think about that and arrive at possible courses of action and then take those actions. Explicitly, agency is about executing three steps: Notice a problem/question. Brainstorm solutions. Try solutions until something works or the costs exceed the benefits. An example I return to often in the summer is air conditioning.
